meanings.sent1: He dognaps the puppy from the park.

meanings.definition: The act of stealing a dog.
meanings.sent1: Dognaps are a serious crime that can break families apart.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to prevent dognaps in the area.
meanings.sent3: The movie plot revolves around a hilarious mix-up of dognaps at the dog show.
meanings.sent4: In the city, dognaps are like a dark cloud hanging over pet owners.
meanings.sent5: The news report highlighted the increase in dognaps, urging caution.
